TopicTitle: Gravity machinima, opening and ending scene

Articles.Content:
ok, after editing because of YT problem now it seems all ok.

These are my videos tnx to KSP.

Watch here the opening scene from Gravity movie: https://youtu.be/UX7aDndNZRI

And here the ending scene (Tiangong crash):

Enjoy both...

Special thanks to Squad for KSP and my many hours of gameplay and fun that I'm having with this game...

Edited September 27, 2015 by Kaihn
Looks like you have some issues whit the videos...

What kind of issues?

They have been uploaded 1 hour ago, maybe YT is taking time (?).

What kind of issues?

They have been uploaded 1 hour ago, maybe YT is taking time (?).

Warner Bros. already flagged you, at least here in the US.

It's strange, it's a machinima and a little parody...

Under exame maybe,

It could be up in few hours, anyway I didn't receive any warning and overall it is not the first time I do a machinima like this... never had problem.

And YT it's plenty of these videos, I think it's a momentary problem.

Let's wait........

- - - Updated - - -

PS: I'm receiving feedback and votes, so I think it is all ok.

I think, perhaps, there could be troubles on the first video but have not received any notice.

But...honestly... I do not think that Warner Bros is going to impoverish because of my video

Edited September 27, 2015 by Kaihn
Wow, in just a couple of hours Warner Bros blocks it.

I don't know, the first video is still there and I didn't receive any notice from YT.

Let's see, but if they did something, they did it in less than 20 minutes

Anyway here's the img :-/

http://postimg.org/image/gjmysop6r/

Still up

- - - Updated - - -

Ok, I received the mail.

The video is blocked in all countries not for the music but for the audio played by actors.

The problem is that I got the audio not from warner video but from another YT user... lol

I'll make a new one with some cut around...

The second one is ok.

Sorry for the inconvenience

Edited September 27, 2015 by Kaihn

It seems that all is ok now.

I've updated new video linked up, ad after "time" Warner bros didn't blocked it. I modified audio and now I really hope that all is good.

Thanks
